meanings.sent1: She firmly antiboycotts unfair treatment of workers.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to antiboycott the unjust labor practices.
meanings.sent3: The determined group antiboycotts any form of discrimination.
meanings.sent4: He always antiboycotts negativity and strives for positivity.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to antiboycott the harmful environmental policies.

meanings.definition: Actions or measures taken to counteract boycotts.
meanings.sent1: The antiboycotts successfully prevented the economic damage.
meanings.sent2: The government implemented antiboycotts to support local businesses.
meanings.sent3: The creative marketing strategy was an effective antiboycott.
meanings.sent4: Their swift response with antiboycotts saved the company's reputation.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful protest served as a powerful antiboycott against injustice.
